K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-1: a'a rya sarba buddha aang+ga ba ti m'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-3: 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dar ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-7: bcom ldan 'das gang+g'a'i klung chen po'i 'gram na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-8: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-9: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-10: rgyal po chen po dag skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-13: bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-20: de la yang 'jigs pa chen po gcig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-21: 'di ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa chen po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15a-25: rgyal po chen po dag de la 'jigs pa chen po gcig po de'i gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad @15b ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-2: gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu stsal bas skyed bu rjes su gzung ba 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-3: deng bdag cag gi rnyed ba legs par rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su thugs mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-5: se go la gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-8: sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-9: des na bdag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-10: sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa yang bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-15: 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-18: sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:15b-19: de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-3: kha dog dang ldan pa yongs su 'grub cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-4: dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-5: de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar gyur pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-6: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad ces gsung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-8: tsa l'a tsa la tsa le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-13: sarba ro ga aa na tre /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-22: koo ra be koo rab be /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-29: bi tsa le; m'a bi la mba hu mu hu mu sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-30: gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-32: h'um h'um si si sv'a h'a; de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad @16b ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-2: bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-3: dus ma lags par 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-5: shve te shve te shve te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-11: yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-12: tsa re tsa re re sv'a h'a mig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-15: rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i rig sngags 'di nyin re la lan re 'don na rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-16: rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-18: rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-19: 'dis sems can thams cad kyi srog la phan btags par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-20: gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin gcig bzhin du tshig tu 'don pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-21: gang yang 'di klog pa de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-22: de'i lus la nad ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:16b-23: chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro; ;mes ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-0: gang la la rgyal pa'i bu dag rig sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas dang @17a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-3: yi ger 'drir 'jug pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-5: sems can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-6: su zhig gis 'di bris nas yan lag la btags na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-8: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-12: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-14: 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-15: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ji na mi tra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-009:17a-17: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha pa bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o ////
